page.title: 12Clubs in Cheddleton
page.content: Many interests are catered for in the activity groups of Cheddleton. Affiliated to St.Edwards Church are: Mothers Union, a team of six bellringers, Capt.Eric Pearson; Mrs. Castle leads the 'all male choir', the Corn Dollies, Womens Choir, Acorn, teenage choir, and Popcorn,junior choir, performing at religious and secular occasions in the Cheddleton area. Mrs. Castle also lead a Barbers Shop Quartet. Ravens is aclub for yung church-goers. Senior Citizens, Playing Field Assoc., W.I. and Chess Club meet at the parish institute. Three social clubs (1) The British Legion.(2) Local Cheddleton people.(3) for employees of St. Edwards Psychiatric Hospital. There are active groups of venture scouts,Scouts,Guide and Brownies,a History Society. Evening activities: Dress-making, yoga, keep fit.
